location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: This bundle consists of summaries of letters from the Governor General of India in Council (3 June, Numbers 26-27; 5 June, Number 28; 6 June, Number 29).The summaries concern the 1857 Indian Mutiny [Rebellion or Uprising], including summaries of reports from the Chief Commissioner of the Punjab, and a summary of a letter to Lord Elgin of 19 May 1857, encouraging Lord Elgin (High Commissioner and Plenipotentiary in China and the Far East) to send European troops from the China Force to India.

name.namePart: Viceroy and Governor-General of India in Council
